summary: I HAVE OWNED MY 2002 FORD TAURUS FOR 32 MONTHS.  DURING THIS TIME, I HAVE HADE THE THE BRAKE PEDAL SWITCH REPLACED TWICE, NEW REAR STRUTS, REPLACED AIRBAG SYSTEM.  THE CAR IS NOW BACK AT FORD TO HAVE A NEW TRANSAXEL INSTALLED.  THERE HAVE BEEN MORE THAN $5,000 IN REPAIRS TO THIS CAR WHICH HAS JUST OVER 60,000 MILES.
